mapper.select: select a.id businessId,a.BUSINESS_CODE businessCode, a.BUSINESS_NAME businessName, a.DEVICE_MODEL deviceModel,a.BUSINESS_TEMPLATE businessTemplate,a.CREATE_DATE createDate,a.FACTORY_CODE, b.TEMPLATE_NAME templateName from t_box_business_category_info a left join t_box_work_order_template_info b on a.BUSINESS_TEMPLATE = b.ID where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.id businessId,a.BUSINESS_CODE businessCode, a.BUSINESS_NAME businessName, a.DEVICE_MODEL deviceModel,a.BUSINESS_TEMPLATE businessTemplate,a.CREATE_DATE createDate,a.FACTORY_CODE from t_box_business_category_info a where a.BUSINESS_TEMPLATE = #{businessTemplate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update t_box_business_category_info
BUSINESS_NAME = #{businessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESS_CODE = #{businessCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEVICE_MODEL = #{deviceModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESS_TEMPLATE = #{businessTemplate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FACTORY_CODE = #{factoryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select a.id businessId,b.BOX_UUID gatewayId,b.BUSINESS_CODE businessCode, b.BUSINESS_STATU businessState from t_box_business_category_info a, t_box_business b where a.BUSINESS_CODE = b.BUSINESS_CODE
and a.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.id businessId,a.BUSINESS_CODE businessCode, a.BUSINESS_NAME businessName, a.DEVICE_MODEL deviceModel,a.BUSINESS_TEMPLATE businessTemplate,a.CREATE_DATE createDate from t_box_business_category_info a
